Laredo.WPMQ285: WPMQ285 is a low-powered Texas Department of Transportation Highway Advisory radio station that serves the Laredo, Texas, area. It broadcasts in two frequencies: 530 AM transmits highway advisory information in Spanish and also repeats WXK26 English NOAA Weather Radio All Hazards information for Webb County and Zapata County and 1610 AM transmits highway advisory information in English.
